suncertify.business

Class BasicContractorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.business.BasicContractorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContractorService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RmiServer

    public class BasicContractorService
extends Object
implements ContractorService
    BasicContractorService is the default implementation of ContractorService. It has an implementation for booking and finding contractors which satisfy certain search criteria from a specified data access object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicContractorService(DBMainExtended data)
      Constructs a new BasicContractorService with the specified data.

    • Method Detail

      • book

        public void book(Contractor contractor)
          throws ContractorNotFoundException,
                 AlreadyBookedException,
                 RemoteException,
                 IllegalArgumentException
        Book the specified contractor. Updates the contractor record in the database with the new contractor data. The contractor record updated will have the same primaryKey value as the specified contractor's primaryKey field.
        Specified by:
        book in interface ContractorService
        Parameters:
        contractor - the contractor to book.
        Throws:
        ContractorNotFoundException - if the specified contractor could be found.
        AlreadyBookedException - if the specified contractor has already been booked.
        RemoteException - if an RMI communication-related exception occurs.
        IllegalArgumentException - if contractor is null.

      • find

        public Map<Integer,Contractor> find(ContractorPk searchKey)
                             throws ContractorNotFoundException,
                                    RemoteException,
                                    IllegalArgumentException
        Find all contractor records with the specified primaryKey. This method uses the name and location fields in the primaryKey to find all contractors with a specific name and/or location. Returns all matching contractors in a map, with the record number of the contractor as the key and the contractor record as the value. This is a case sensitive search.

        Example 1: A primaryKey with name="Fred" and location="Paris" will return all non-deleted records of contractors who's name is "Fred", and location is "Paris".

        Example 2: A primaryKey with name="Fred" and location="" will return all non-deleted records of contractors who's name is "Fred".

        Example 3: A primaryKey with name="" and location="Paris" will return all non-deleted records of contractors who's location is "Paris".

        Example 4: A primaryKey with name="" and location="" will return all non-deleted contractor records available.
        Specified by:
        find in interface ContractorService
        Parameters:
        searchKey - the primary key
        Returns:
        a map, with the record number of the contractor as the key and the contractor records the value.
        Throws:
        ContractorNotFoundException - if no contractor with the specified primaryKey could be found.
        RemoteException - if an RMI communication-related exception occurs.
        IllegalArgumentException - if ContractorPk is null.
